data.text: @JoePajak Done already. Please keep spreading the word. We need information about covid if we are to take responsibility for our own health.
@JoePajak @UKHSA The Covid app is an inconvenient truth  for this shower of fun loving crims

#ZoeCovidStudy funding is ending...
Disappointed this funding is ending?

Please do feel free to use the details to send your own respectful email to Dr Jenny Harries, who is the Chief Executive of the UK Health Security Agency.

Alternatively, email enquiries@ukhsa.gov.uk

@JoePajak @UKHSA New email address: enquiries@ukhsa.gov.uk 

Sent, and copied in my MP

#ZoeCovidStudy funding is ending...

Are you disappointed this funding is ending?

Please do feel free to use the details to send your own respectful email to Dr Jenny Harries, who is the Chief Executive of the UK Health Security Agency.

Email: CEX.UKHSA@dhsc.gov.uk
@JoePajak @UKHSA Very disappointing, it is vital information to keep vulnerable people safe.
